subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets had an impressive April. But on the last day of the month, they were confronted with injuries to two prominent players, then were hammered by the Florida Marlins at Shea Stadium.
snippet: The Mets had an impressive April. But on the last day of the month, they were confronted with injuries to two prominent players, then were hammered by the Florida Marlins at Shea Stadium.
